articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077: CD Projekt to 'Undertake Vigorous Action' to Defend Itself Against Lawsuit - IGN - IGN
articles.description: Cyberpunk 2077 publisher CD Projekt S.A. has publicly acknowledged the lawsuit filed against the company and has committed to "undertake vigorous action to defend itself against any such claims."
